video_prompt: Glowing letter outlines pulse. Organic root-like tendrils unfurl and intertwine with growing leaves. Golden textures shimmer and shift. A holographic surface subtly changes colors. Gear mechanisms rotate within glowing numbers. Light streaks and speckles subtly shift behind pulsing text. Play button symbol emits an amber glow.
image_prompt: futuristic graphic design, glowing outline font "civita", large artistic "29" combining organic and mechanical elements, golden textured "2" with root-like tendrils and iridescent interior, transparent "9" with glowing gear mechanism and play button, dark background, prominent green leaves, bio-digital fusion theme.
refined_video_prompt: Letter outlines pulse with an evolving glow. Organic root-like tendrils unfurl, intertwining with growing leaves. Golden textures shimmer and fluidly shift. A holographic surface subtly transitions through colors. Gear mechanisms rotate within glowing numbers. Light streaks and speckles actively shift, weaving behind pulsing text. The play button symbol's amber glow dynamically intensifies and fades.
